name: Ihsam International Aviation Academy Crew
about: Ihsam International Aviation Academy is a premier flight training institution dedicated to providing exceptional quality in pilot education. Our academy boasts a modern fleet of 21 late-model aircraft, including Cessna 172s, Piper Seneca IVs, and Beechcraft BE-76 Duchesses, all maintained to the highest FAA standards. With a focus on safety and excellence, we offer FAA-certified CFR 141 and 61 programs, as well as specialized courses in Aviation Leadership and Personal Success. Our training environment includes advanced flight simulators, a low student-to-instructor ratio, and unlimited landings at 22 practice airports. We are committed to preparing students for successful careers as professional pilots, with a 96% first-attempt pass rate for FAA certification tests and a strong track record of placing graduates with major international airlines. At Ihsam International Aviation Academy, we define excellence in pilot training.
services:
["Flight Attendant/Steward
Maritime Reception Agent
Ground Agent
Bachelor in Tourism and Hospitality"]
